articles.title: NASA to Reveal New Mars Sample Return Plans on Jan. 7 – Here’s How to Tune In - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: NASA’s Mars Sample Return mission faces a pivotal moment. With costs soaring and timelines slipping, the agency is rethinking its approach to one of its most ambitious goals: bringing Mars rocks back to Earth. A major announcement on Jan. 7 could reshape the …
articles.content: NASA is set to kick off 2025 with a significant announcement about its ambitious Mars Sample Return program. On Tuesday, Jan. 7, the agency will host an audio-only press conference at 1:00 p.m. EST (… [+3349 chars]
